description: The plot to attack American passengers came weeks before the Paris attacks in which 130 people died.
title: France train attack: Four stand trial over foiled Thalys shooting
title_page: France train attack: Four stand trial over foiled Thalys shooting - BBC News
maintext: Ayoub El-Khazzani, a Moroccan national who fought with Islamic State (IS) militants in Syria, told the earlier hearing attended by AFP that Abaaoud had said he should target Americans: "He told me the best way of carrying out my mission was to use explosives. But I said I preferred a Kalashnikov." The pair allegedly travelled to Europe from Syria and stayed together in Brussels.
